mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.HEAD_IMG AS "headImg", a.OPEN_ID AS "openId", a.NICK_NAME AS "nickName", a.USER_NAME AS "userName"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_user a
a.del_flag = #{delFlag}
AND a.HEAD_IMG LIKE CONCAT('%', #{headImg}, '%')
AND a.OPEN_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{openId}, '%')
AND a.NICK_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nickName}, '%')
AND a.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userName}, '%')
${sqlMap.dsf}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user( id, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag, HEAD_IMG, OPEN_ID, NICK_NAME, USER_NAME ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{headImg}, #{openId}, #{nickName}, #{userName} )
